dialogueSequence.sentence: So, You’ve managed to overcome me, your own father.
I have nothing left to teach you. This little lesson in self reliance was all you needed.
Bork Bark (But you just said I rely on my allies for power.)
I’d be a hypocrite if I told you I came into power without the help of my own friends.
Besides, you conquered a whole world!  That’s reward enough for me.
Woof bark (So will you leave this planet alone? Cease your ambitions?)
Oh, I’m always ambitious. But even I need a break now and again.
I’ll be on Earth torturing some souls if you need me.
I’ll be on Earth torturing some souls if you need me.
Bark bork (Who’s going to rule hell in your place?)
Bark bork (You don’t want another power struggle, do you?)
That’s where you step in son. Make me proud.
